2105330.name: Vanessa
2105330.description: Vanessa is a superhero open world game where you can explore the city. A ninja fighter girl called Dragon Gwen has trained you to move around like a superhero and shoot rope from your grappling gun. Be the best superhero girl who is fit, strong and wears a cool superhero outfit. When Vanessa was a normal citizen she got bored, so now she wants to be an energetic superhero using parkour through out the city. This game takes place in a city filled with criminal gangs who like to cause trouble with the police. Vanessa roams around the city looking for crime to stop and wants to make sure citizens do not get harmed. She wants to fight criminal bosses and stop their organizations so they can stop causing trouble on the streets.
2105330.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
